inn1.comm: shout for lbw but missing leg stump. It curved in towards middle and leg, hint of inswing to the left-hand batsman, and he fell over a touch trying to flick to the on side
this one moves towards off and middle, pushed to the off side
swings away from the batsman who lets it go through.
beaten outside off. It curved away from short of length and Tamim went in search of it. Praveen Kumar's strength is the inswing to the right-hand batsmen which obviously leaves the LHB
That line works for Praveen. Tamim is gone, fishing outside off stump. Pretty similar to the last delivery and Tamim went for a drive away from the body and nicked it behind.
beaten on the forward prod. This one straightened outside off and he pushes inside the line
strays on to the pads and clipped behind square leg for a single.
angled well outside off stump, moving further away and it's a wide
on the off and middle line, straightening a touch, jabbed to the off side
full, well outside off, searches out for the ball, goes for a big drive and edges it to Yusuf Pathan at third man
in the zone outside off stump, full in length, holds its line and is left alone
edged to third man. Probing delivery coming in towards middle before straightening a touch and Nafees pushed inside the line, got squared up a s the ball straightened and got a leading edge
slanted across the batsman who shoulders arms
a tad short in length ,cutting away from Nafees who cuts hard to Yuvraj at backward point
on the middle and leg, wristed to square leg
on the off stump line, no room given and Nafees defends to the off side.
lands on the leg stump on a length, moves towards middle and dabbed to the leg side and Praveen Kumar picks the ball up, turns and walks back to the top of his mark.
around that off stump, Nafees leans across, opens the bat-face and guides it to third man for a single
drifting towards the pads, turned just behind square leg for a single
edged between the slips standing wide apart from each other. Short of length, angling outside off stump, Ash slashed at the width offered and got a thick healthy edge
a tad fuller, on a length, and moving away from Ashraful who shoulders arms this time
again testing him out with a delivery well outside off and angling away, left alone
closer to the off stump, Ash is a touch late in leaning forward to defend and edges it, along the ground, past a diving Rohit Sharma at second slip
just outside the off stump, shaping in a touch, Nafees looked like he would go for the cut shot but changed his mind and let the ball go through to the 'keeper
shout for lbw as it slants in towards leg and middle and bobs off the pad to the leg side. There must have been some inside edge as Ashoka de Silva gives it a run
just outside off stump line, full in length and Nafees taps it to covers. It's quite and hot and humid day
short in length, on the off and middle, Nafees mistimes his pull to mid-on. Praveen smiles and has a chat with a team-mate
beaten outside off stump by a peach. It landed back of length, around middle and off and moved past the outside edge. Late movement and the batsman was done in by that.
straightens on the middle stump line and defended to the on side.
and once again beaten outside off. Not much room but Nafees goes for an ambitious cut
sprints in, lands it on a length outside off and is steered past point for a single
fullish, on the legs and Nafees picked it up cleanly over square leg. A very wristy stroke. That would do him good.

No, evidently not as RP has cleaned him up with an in cutter. It landed just outside off stump, on a length and Nafees was caught at the crease, the bat came across the line and the middle stump was pegged back. He was trying to move back instead of coming forward there.
lands outside off stump and moves further away, easily left alone.
gets off the mark with a  single down to third man
stretches across to defend a full delivery outside off stump
full and outside off stump, squeezed to wide third man for a single
fullish, driven to mid-off
leans forward to dead-bat a length delivery. Ash ties his shoe laces, adjusts his gloves, his helmet and is ready now
homing in on the off stump, he gets his bat in front of the pad to defend to the off side
hurls across a bouncer and Ash ducks to evade it
another sharp lifter, around the off stump and Ash is surprised but adjusts well by taking out the bottom-hand of the handle and fends it to the off side, behind his wicket
follows two short-pitched deliveries with a fuller one, driven to mid-off
cutting away from the batsman who lets it go through to Dhoni. Bangladesh wobbling a touch at 19 for 2.
width offered outside off and slashed to third man
slanting across Ashraful who continues to remain patient and watches it sail into Dhoni's gloves. The all new Ash.
gets his front foot forward and across, moves closer to the line of a length delivery moving away from him and square drives to point

closer to the off stump and Ashraful leans across, head over the ball, and defends to the off side. He does some gardening down the track, looks about at the field set and gets ready to face the next ball
short in length, angling away, Ashraful goes back and steers to third man for a single
outside off stump, dabbed to point

fuller, on the off stump line, Ashraful is struck at the crease - should have got forward - and pushes it past the diving Rohit Sharma at short straight mid-off but there is a man behind him to cover up. George drawls, "ah that was so nearly the first run in front of the wicket."
The all new ash goes back to an old edition. He moves towards off stump and tries to paddle sweep a length delivery just around leg stump line and misses it
turned to long leg for a single
bouncer and Raqibul ducks
on the middle and leg, turned to long leg where Irfan Pathan makes the stop
leans across to drive a full delivery to covers.
short, wide, too wide for the batsman to play a shot at it
another short of length delivery, moving away again from well outside off stump.
And that's the first run in front of wicket. Almost didn't happen as Ash was ball watching after Raqibul had driven a full delivery to left of mid-off
short and outside off stump, wide called , RP and Dhoni don't look too pleased with the call. Very harsh call.
on the pads, flicked to long leg and Praveen bowls in his throw from the ropes
well outside off stump and yet another wide. Dhoni asks RP to change angles from round the stumps.
from round the stumps. full and on the off stump line, straightening a touch, driven to mid-off
leans forward to defend a length delivery coming in. And that's the end of the over. Finally. Phew.
starts off with a wide outside off stump.

Edge taken and the ball flies between Dhoni and Sehwag, standing wide. This is the second time the ball has flown through the gap at the cordon. It was full and angling away and the batsman went for a big drive outside off
leans forward to defend to the off side
another slash outside off and this time squeezed to right of Sehwag at wide first slip down to third man
on the off and middle, jabbed to the off side
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to cover point
lovely square drive from Raqibul. He leaned into his drive, got close to the line of full delivery outside off and found the gap perfectly.
from round the stumps, just outside off stump, nudged to backward point
full pitched, driven to extra cover where Gambhir fields.
on a length, around the off stump, again from that round-the-stumps angle, defended to the off side
leans forward to punch a length delivery on the up to covers
short of length, well outside off, Ash goes for the cut and misses
again well outside off, off a length, left alone
pitched on leg and turned away to midwicket
pitched on middle, Raqibul gets forward and defends
short and pitched on off, moving away, Raqibul sets up for the cut and plays to point
This time he finds the boundary. overpitched delivery driven through covers between fielders
pitched on middle and off, pushed to point
played back to the bowler
short and outside off, but Ashraful doesn't get the middle of the bat trying to cut and the ball is up in the air for a while
pitched down the leg side
pitched on off, turned away to leg
pitched on off, driven back down the pitch
pitched on off and Raqibul tries to make room for the cut shot but just bangs it down on the pitch instead
pitched on off, moving in and defended on to the ground with a straight bat
pitched on off and middle, defended to the off side
defended on the back foot to the off side
pitched on leg and nudged away to short-leg area
pitched on middle and Ashraful pushes it to point with a horizontal bat
nudged to leg and Raqibul wants to take a single but Irfan is quick on getting to the ball
driven to mid-off and this time they get a quick single
pitched outside off and moving away, Ashraful lifts it over the inside fielders to long-off
yorker length on off, Raqibul scoops it out over the non-striker's head
pitched outside off ans seamed in to get the inside edge before hitting the pad. He was lucky it didn't hit the stumps
shorter delivery and Raqibul misses completely while trying to pull
pitched on leg and going down, it brushes Raqibul's pads as he tries to flick
slower ball outside off, Raqibul drives to point
pitched on middle and driven back to the bowler
pitched on off and pushed to point
yorker length and Raqibul digs it out just in time as it pitched right at his toes on middle stump
pitched on middle and turned away to mid-on for a quick single
pitched on middle and leg and defended off the front foot
overpitched outside off, Raqibul gets forward and drives through cover
pitched on middle and defended off the front foot
pitched on middle and Raqibul looks for a run but the ball drops on the pitch
hit to cover uppishly
edged to behind point trying to cut
played to extra cover for single
flicked to square leg
slower ball pitched on middle, Raqibul waited on it and cut it to point despite being cramped for room
pitched outside off and moving awat, Raqibul drives it through extra cover with  ease
pitched short but moves in to the batsman who turns it to leg side
slightly over-pitched now, round the wicket delivery, played behind point
short of a length outside off, driven to cover
Raqibul plays it on the full to kill the turn and sweeps to fine leg where Irfan makes a fine save
Ashraful tries to sweep as well and gets hit on the pad
googly. pitched outside off and comes in to Ashrful who is pushed towards leg on the crease in trying to drive the ball to the off
cut to point for single
defended off the front foot to leg side
driven to sweeper cover
floated on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
fuller, on driven for a single
leans forward to drive to long-on
outside off stump, punched through cover point
turned to square leg for yet another single
waits for the ball to come to him before pushing it to cover point for a single.
leans forward to drive to covers
flighted one on the off and middle, worked to midwicket region
tossed up full outside off, mistimes a drive to mid-off
leans across, pushed to cover point for a quick single
short delivery outside off stump, cut to covers
flighted one outside off, turns slightly, driven towards mid-off
coming in with the arm on the middle stump line, jabbed off the inside edge to the on side
goes down on his knee to paddle a delivery on the middle and off to fine leg
quicker, on the middle and leg, dabbed past square leg for a single
slower, shorter, outside off, cut to deep point
fuller, bit more air, driven back to Yuvi
on the middle, goes on straight, pushed to off side and there is no chance of a single
tossed up outside off, driven inside-out over extra cover for couple of runs.
on the middle and off, turning in, nudged to square leg
flighted really full on the middle, driven to extra cover
width offered outside off stump and crashed to right of sweeper cover where Yusuf Pathan makes a fine diving stop
lands on a length outside off and spins away, Raqibul is unsure, has a poke and is beaten
fuller, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on for a single
turning in to middle and off, punched to long-on
leans forward to steer to cover point
fuller and they will pick up a single with a drive to long on
turns in ever so slightly from outside off, late cut to left of Gambhir at short third man
this time to right of Gambhir for yet another single
soft dismissal. Bit more air, fuller and Ash drives straight back to the bowler who picks it inches off the turf. Yusuf's first ODI wicket.
turns from the off stump line, punched to extra cover
driven through mid-off for a run.
leans across to tap a full delivery to cover point with the turn for a quick single
tossed up outside off and driven uppishly to long-off
flighted on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
slower in the air, fuller, driven to long-off
full outside off, not much turn, driven to long-off for another run
flighted outside off, driven hard to covers
stretches across, taps the ball to the vacant leg side infield and rushes across for a quick single. Yousuf had run to pick the ball
short and is cut to deep point region. 100 up for Bangladesh.
driven to left of Yousuf who makes a diving stop
well outside off stump, driven to deep cover.
outside off stump, goes on straight, a topspinner and mistimes a drive back to the bowler
steered to backward point
short and cut to sweeper cover
leans forward to drive to long-off
floated outside off, no turn, dabbed to backward point
turned to midwicket
leans forward to drive a full delivery to long-on
turns in from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
steps down the track, the ball dips rapidly on him and he pushes it to the on side
slower through the air, he is made to wait and drives to the off side
Rahim tries to slog sweep a delivery turning away from him and top edges it straight up to the off side and Raina comes in from covers to take the catch.
turns past the lame poke
low dipping full toss on the middle stump, paddled to fine leg
shapes to paddle, Chawla gets it to turn from outside off and he paddles it on to his pad
cut to right of point where Yousuf fumbles a touch and misses a run out chance. Fifty for Raqibul. The lone man fighting.
short and cut to sweeper cover
turns in from outside off stump, defended down the track
a touch short and punched to deep cover for a single
flighted loopy delivery outside off, turned to midwicket
slower, well outside off, he is made to wait on the stroke and pushes it to covers
gets forward to drive to long-on
fuller, on the middle, he stays back instead of going forward and manages to jab it to the leg side
long hop and he rocks back to pull it to deep midwicket boundary
now picks up a single down to long-on
short of length, turns away outside off, cut to left of backward point where Yousuf makes a diving half-stop
googly from well outside off, left alone
flighted delivery on the middle, driven down the pitch
over spinner outside off stump, bit more bounce, cut down to backward point
short and unlike the previous delivery which was cut to backward point, he hits this one to deep point
fuller, turned to midwicket
goes back to punch to long-on
takes the pace off the ball, floated full on the off, driven again to long-on
Kapali again stays back to a full delivery but wrists it to square leg
fullish, outside off stump, angling away, driven to long-off
holds it across the seam and bowls a off cutter on the off stump line, swatted to his right and he misfields
on the off stump line, cutting away a touch, pushed to the off side for a quick single
a touch wide outside off stump, cut off the front foot past the lunging Yuvraj Singh at point
off cutter around that off stump, pushed down the track
from round the stumps now, a length delivery homing in on the off stump and defended to the off side. Drinks break.
flighted delivery on the off stump line and Kapali chips it to cow corner - between deep midwicket and long-on
rotates the strike with a drive to long-on
full and on the off and middle, turned to midwicket
stretches across to push to covers, wants a single but Kapali sends him back
on the pads, turned past short fine leg
slower one from round the stumps, full, driven to short extra cover
banged in short, on the middle and leg line, pulled to long leg
well outside off stump, holding its line, Kapali has a swing and a miss
short-pitched delivery down the leg side
coming in just outside off stump, cut to third man
full pitched delivery on the middle and off, driven past mid-on and the long-off fielder comes across to make the stop
goes over the wickets and hurls a length delivery outside off which is slashed off the front foot to deep cover
RP starts with round-the-stumps attack. Homing in on the off stump, shoveled to midwicket
short of length, punched in the air to right of extra cover where Raina makes a flying half-stop
fuller, misses the waft across the line and hits him on the pad. It was going down the leg side
curves in to the off stump, pushed back to RP
short of length,  just outside off, cut to covers
goes for the yorker, serves a low full toss on the legs which is flicked to fine leg for a boundary. 13 overs to go.
Raqibul is cutting loose. It was banged in short outside off and he pulled it to wide long-on
goes hard into his drive to a fullish delivery outside off and mistimes it to extra cover for a single
lands it on a length, on the off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
slightly slower in pace, on a length outside off and is flat-batted to right of long-off
cleaned him up. It landed on a length, on the middle and leg, straightened and Kapali went across the line and missed it completely.
full and outside off, pushed to cover, slip in place, by the way
tossed up well outside off, turning away, tries to slog sweep but slaps it down the ground to long-off
quicker one, tapped to the off side
flat and fast again, outside off, cut away off the back foot towards deep point
little step down the ground and pushed towards wide long-off
quicker again, straight too, knocked towards cover off the back foot
tossed up on middle, defended off the front foot
wide of the stumps but he's missed out, cuts straight to Yuvraj at gully
slower one, ends up as a loopy full toss, driven to deep point, he was a bit confused with that
124.7kph, straight and on off, not much room to play with, patted back to the bowler
tucked back towards long-on
backs away and rattles that through extra cover, gets the gap and that's racing away, Raqibul is holding forte now
on the pads, clipped behind square for a quick one
cut behind point
a bit short again, backs away and cuts gently towards deep point
quicker one, pitches back of a length and turns a bit, tucked away towards midwicket
down the track, takes it on the full and crashes to Yuvraj, good stop there
slower one again, thinks of a slog sweep but ends up slapping to deep extra cover
pushed to mid-on
walks across a bit and turns it towards deep square leg
slapped towards point, they hurry through for a quick one
patted past the off-side ring towards the deep point fielder, lots of work for him today
slower one this time, he saw the batsman walking down the track, bowls that short and keeps the pace down, glided towards short third man
punched through cover, mid-off puts in a dive but can't get to it, Irfan Pathan should have stopped that, runs away for four
yorker outside off, batsman leaves it alone

charges down the track , Sehwag slows up the pace of the flighted delivery and he is into his lofted shot early, got under a bit too much and skied it in the gap between long-on and deep midwicket. It looks like he is cramping up
swept to short fine leg where Gambhir fails to pick it up cleanly and Raqibul hobbles across. Definite cramps.
another tight single to Gambhir and Raqibul scrambles across and dives to make in to the crease. Cramps set in again. The physio is out there. Hot and humid day.
turns in to the pad, turned to short fine leg. Kapali had come to the arena to act as a byerunner but Raqibul sent him back
spinning in, turned to short fine leg
on that middle and leg line again, worked behind square leg for a single
a touch short in length, pulled to midwicket
just short of the blockhole, driven to left of mid-on and he limps across. Now he gets cramps in his hands.
good clean hit. He heaves a length delivery to wide long-on boundary and the crowd cheer as the ball races to the ropes
fuller, outside off, on driven to long-on for a single
Raqibul won't get to his hundred. Pity about the cramps. He pulled a short -pitched delivery straight to mid-on. But this has been a very valuable knock from him.
outside the off stump and moves past the outside edge
spinning into the middle and leg line, turned to short fine leg
around off and middle, driven to long leg
steered to short third man for a single and Praveen's throw crashes into Dhoni's ankles
shortish, turning in, swatted to midwicket
leans forward to defend a flighted delivery just outside off stump
from round the stumps, lands it on a length, moves it towards middle stump line, worked to the on side for a single
fuller, on the middle and leg, shoveled in the air to the right of Praveen at mid-on
back of length, just outside off stump, dabbed to right of backward point
lands on a length on the middle and off, straightens, pushed through covers for a single
full pitched and driven hard to left of long-off where Praveen makes a tumbling stop
Short of length, he top edges a pull and Raina and Sehwag almost collide in the mid-on region but Sehwag takes it in the end even as Raina manages to move away just in time.
turns in towards middle and off, pushed to extra cover
shout for lbw but he was hit outside the off stump, trying to work it to the on side. The replays actually suggest he was hit on the line of off stump
comes down the track, Sehwag drags back the length and he defends to the off side
comes down the track, and swings a slow loopy spinner on the leg stump to right of long leg where Gambhir makes a fine diving stop
Mortaza sends it to wide long-on boundary. The thrust of the front leg, the clean powerful swing of the bat and the ball went soaring into the stands
fuller, swung to midwicket
slips down the leg side and Ashoka de Silva extends his arms
steered to point region for a single

Farhad Reza is run out. Really full, just short of the blockhole, driven through the off side for a single. The throw misses the stumps at non-striker's ends and the fielder backing up from long leg fires in a throw to Dhoni who breaks the stumps quickly.
comes in from round the stumps, worked to left of midwicket
low swinging full toss, outside off, driven hard but straight to covers
tries to heave it to on side but will pick up just a single
full and outside off stump and the left-handed batsman fetches it from there to swing it to cow corner
full pitched on the stumps, driven to extra cover
walks right across the stumps, clips a full delivery over square leg
backs away to the leg side, RP follows him with a full delivery ,driven to long-on
moves outside leg stump, RP hurls a low full toss outside off and the batsman can't reach it
full again, mistimes a drive to midwicket.
outside the off stump, swing and a miss
walks outside off stump, Irfan follows him with a full delivery and its driven to long on
off cutter outside off, Mortaza had opened his stance up and top edges a heave to mid-off and Gambhir cleans up running in from long-off
tries a slower one but hurls it well outside off stump and this time Razzak didn't walk across
does so this time, tries to swing a full delivery from outside off over midwicket but misses it completely
again he walks outside off stump, again he misses his shot across the line and Dhoni underarms a direct hit to run out Mortaza
Bangladesh have been restricted to 222. Full delivery from round the stumps, heaved to Praveen Kumar at long-on

inn2.comm: Gambhir is standing outside the crease. Cutting away from Gambhir who lets it go through to the 'keeper
full and on the middle stump line, straightening a bit and Gambhir works it to midwicket and they take off for the single.
lands on a length, just outside off, shapes away a touch, Sehwag stands at his crease to punch it to the covers
on the off stump line, again moving away a bit, Sehwag goes back to play it close to the body, back down the track
short of length, on the off stump, Sehwag is a touch tentative, pushes his bat in front of the body and jabs it to the leg side
flowing square drive. He was on the middle-stump guard, leaned across to a full delivery leaving him and drove it through the cover point gap.
121.3 kmph delivery on the middle that straightens and bounces a bit, pushed back down the track
short and outside off, Gambhir forces it off the back foot through front of the point region
leans forward to a length delivery and punches it back down the track
in the zone outside off stump, tapped to point
leans forward to mistime a drive to short cover. The bat-handle rotated in his hands and the timing went awry
short of length, skids on towards the off stump, defended to the off side

loud shout for lbw but was it too high? It cut in off a length, Sehwag was beaten by the nipbacker, was caught at the crease, tried to stab at it and was struck in front of middle. He was on his toes and that must have made Ashoka that it would have gone over. The virtual eye suggests it would have hit the top of the middle. Sehwag survives.
on the legs, flicked to square leg
fuller, on the off stump, driven to mid-on
short of length, angling away, punched to backward point
off cutter angling away from Gambhir who has a poke and a miss
gets forward, opens the bat-face to adjust to the movement and steers to backward point

almost caught by Kapali at backward point. Gambhir squeezed an intended on the up drive to a length delivery off the outside edge to Kapali who lunged but it just fell short or did it carry. We need better replays
short of length, on the middle and off, punched to covers
tries to york him, offers a low dipping full toss and Sehwag makes contact with the toe end of the bat but still times it well down the track. He has a look at his bat.
short of length, outside off stump, Sehwag takes the bottom-hand off the handle and slices it to third man and he will take an extra run for the overthrow
on a length, around the off stump, edged behind square leg
on the middle stump line, whipped to square leg
slower in pace, on the off stump, tapped close to the off stump, one look at each other and off they rush across for a quick single. These two run really well together
short of length, cutting away and Gambhir slashes if off the back foot and just over the backward point who jumped but couldn't reach it. just over.
fuller, on the middle and off , Sehwag drives to mid-off. He didn't quite lean into the drive and he practises that shot again. And again.
lovely leg cutter that beats Sehwag completely. It landed on a length around the off and cut away,  Sehwag shuffled back and tried to drive on the up and the bat went inside the line

leading edge but it doesn't carry to extra cover. And poor fielding. It curved off a length on the middle, Sehwag was trying to drive to leg side and edges it to the cover region. There was an over throw and the fielder running in from long leg fires another wide throw and that runs over the boundary
hit to backward point, no run
back of a length, sliding down leg, Sehwag times it wonderfully in the gap between midwicket and mid-on
that was a half-tracker, and got the treatment it deserved, disdainfully smashed over midwicket for a boundary
And another one, that's poor bowling, short and very wide and Sehwag doesn't miss those,  powerfully cut away for four
better ball that, on the off, punched off the backfoot but doesn't beat the field
Oooh, that was close, no footwork as Sehwag flashes outside off, take a thin outside edge and tuns past the keeper for four
driven to cover and a misfield lets results in a single
driven off the backfoot, good fielding at mid-on
full length, just outside off, defended by Gambhir
defended again by Gambhir, he still on 9 while Sehwag has raced along to 33
strays on to his pads, Gambhir tries to tuck it away to leg, no run
on off, Gambhir taps it to mid-off, very well run single
on a length on leg stump, Gambhir times that superbly through midwicket, it races away for four
tried to force that square on the off, but fielded at backward point
Gambhir is looking dangerous, that's the second delightful shot this over, a bit of width, smashed away square for four
defended back to the bowler
punched to cover, no run results
down the leg, but too far down, and he'll have to bowl that again
Gambhir is turning it on here, another boundary in the point region
again straying on to leg, Sehwag pushes it to midwicket and they take a quick two
just short of a length, on the off stump, inside-edged by Sehwag
defended confidently by Gambhir
driven to cover, but can't pierce the field
on a good length but on leg stump, Gambhir turns it away square on the leg for a single
back of a length, on his pads again, whipped away to square leg
this one whistles down leg and that's a wide
slightly overpitched, well oustide off and Sehwag blasts it over extra cover for a six . Stunning shot that
Another wide down leg. 8 runs of 1 ball in this over
Four this time, a long hop, Sehwag transfers his weight to the back foot and swings to the midwicket boundary
very poor bowling, down the leg, Sehwag helps it on its way for another four and his fifty comes up
What a shot! A repeat of the previous six in this over, pummelled over extra cover again
short ball, Sehwag goes for the hook, top edges it, balloons in the air but it falls safe. No luck for Bangladesh so far
He's got him this time. Another short ball, Sehwag hooks it, makes better  contact this time and it goes straight to Tamim Iqbal at square leg.
full pitch, on off, Gambhir drives it powerfully but it doesn't beat the field
tries to punch that through the off and he misses that, goes through to the keeper
shortish ball, again outside off, Gambhir is beaten for the second time in a row as his attempted cut doesn't make contact
in the channel, Gambhir manages to square drive that off the back foot for a single
first ball to Rohit, good length on middle, Rohit comes forward late but pushes it away for a single
hit to square leg, straight to the fielder
shortish outside off, good looking push square on the off by Rohit, no run though
short of length on off, that bounces quite a bit, Rohit defends off the back foot
Oh that was close! short again, wider this time, still not enough room to cut, Rohit attempts the shot anyway, takes the top edge and flies between the keeper and slip.
defended back to the bowler, another good over this
shortish and defended down the ground again
on his pads this time, Rohit turns it behind square but no run again, fielder throw the stumps down but the batsmen have no cause for concern
on his legs, hits his pads and runs away to fine-leg for a single
hit to midwicket for a single
another single, Bangladesh have managed to keep things quiet for a bit now
gets right behind it, and defended stylishly
slower ball, Rohit guides it to third man for a single
good shot down the ground, but can't beat mid-off
in the corridor, just short of a length, Rohit drives it gracefully but can't beat the field
another good delivery, Rohit plays it to point for a single
fullish on middle and leg driven to midwicket, another single
Gambhir steps down the track, but that was a leg stump line, cramps him for room but Gambir manages to turn it to fine-leg
Gorgeous shot from Rohit, short on middle and leg, Rohit leans back and pulls it for an extremely flat six
defended off the back foot
short, a bit of width, Gambhir cuts it for a single
that kept low, Rohit playing on the backfoot, edges it on to his pads
short and hit to cover, no run
moves across and plays it to midwicket for a single
down the track, and smashed through the covers for a boundary.
Gambhir is very good against the spinners and he showing it here. He dispatches this for a huge six over long-off
a bit of width, Rohit guides it down to third man for a single
short ball outside off, Gambhir pulls, doesn't time it too well, but the ball has enough pace to beat the square leg fielder
better ball this time, Gambhir was in a bit of bother but he manages to push it back to the bowler
full, a bit of width, driven to cover and the batsmen scamper a single
full length, Rohit pushes it to point
hit to point, can't beat the field again
superb delivery, flighted on a length, Gambhir plays for the turn, but it doesn't and it goes past his outside egge
driven down the ground, easy single
a leg-side wide from Razzak, Bangladesh can't afford giving away free runs
on a length, on the stumps, Rohit defends it back to the bowler
flighted and driven to long-off again for a single
defended to silly mid-on
short ball, outside leg, Gambhir turns it away towards fine leg
good start from Mahmuddullah, defends it square on the off
hit wide of mid-on for a single
flighted delivery and hit to long-off
defended back to the bowler
hits it towards mid-on
gets a single this time by hitting it past midwicket
Rohit was in trouble this time, defended but not with any degree of confidence
played back to the bowler, more in control this time
pushed to long-off, only a single
The batsmen aren't taking any risks now. The runs are coming in singles. This time to mid-on
driven to cover  but can't beat the fielder
hit to sweeper cover off the front foot
pushed to short midwicket
no run this time as it goes straight to cover
tossed up, inside-edge on to his pads
can't beat the short fine leg fielder this time
gets off strike with a single through covers
back foot drive past mid-on
hit to short cover, no run
single to sweeper cover
driven to long-on, Gambhir inches towards his fifty
pushed towards silly point
turned off his pads towards midwicket
another single, driven to cover
on the legs, tickled to short fine leg.
slower through the air, Gambhir waits for it before steering to cover point for a single that brings up his ninth ODI fifty
turns to legs, Rohit waits for it to arrive before wristing it past square leg
arm ball just outside off stump, short and Gambhir cuts to deep point
turning in towards the off stump, pushed to the on side and the bowler rushes to his right and towards mid-on to make the stop
hangs on the back foot and drives to mid-off
turns in from outside off, punched to long-on for a single

Rohit loses patience and Mortaza takes a good lunging catch at square leg to send him back. Rohit top edged his slog sweep and it swirled in the air as Mortaza ran back , got under it and lunged forward to take the catch
short of length, spins in, pushed to long-on
leans forward to defend to covers
fuller and Yuvraj is beaten on the lunge
on the middle and leg, another single to long-on
short and Yuvraj wrists it through wide midwicket
flighted loopy delivery, driven to covers
comes down the track, length is dragged and defended on the lunge
it was short and Yuvraj picked it up early, rocked back and swung it high over midwicket
stretches across to defend to the off side
quicker one, fuller, on the off stump and defended on the front foot
spins in from outside off stump, defended to the off side
turned past square leg
not all that short but Yuvraj goes back to cut to sweeper cover
spinning into the middle and leg line, turned to fine leg
quicker, flatter and defended down the track
short and Yuvraj pulls it to deep midwicket region
leans forward to defend to the off side and the 'keeper Rahim gets across to pick it up
Sweet. Yuvraj went back to a delivery a tad short and punch-drove it between the bowler and the mid-on fielder.
leans forward to on drive for a single
backs away to the leg side and pushes to cover point
on the middle and off, Gambhir backs away a touch to punch it through covers. He loves getting beside the line of the ball
flatter, quicker, cut to covers
driven uppishly inside out past the bowler to long-off. He took couple of steps and drove a flighted turning delivery on the up against the turn
leans forward to defend
stays back to a full delivery- almost missed it- lunged at the end to drive to long-on
another couple of steps down and this time drives to wide long-on
tossed up outside off stump, driven to deep cover
leans across to defend and the ball doesn't turn and is beaten
short in length, cut through the off side field
fullish, driven to long-on for a single
on the off stump, again backs to the leg, makes room and cuts to deep cover
leans forward to defend
shortish, punched to long-on
moves outside leg to punch to deep cover
leans forward to drive, misses and is struck on the pad
threatens to step down and he fires it in quickly, jabbed to the leg side
goes back to tap it to the leg side
goes back to punch to long-on
spins in, goes back to push it to the long-on region
jumps down the track, reaches the pitch of a flighted delivery and drives inside-out beautifully to wide long-off boundary.
one foot out and a ferocious slog sweep. Another boundary.
comes down the track and drives inside out to right of long-off
moves outside leg and punches the ball on the middle to covers
and again, makes his own room and cuts
What a fab player against Spin. One of the best in India. Again he dances down the track, making room to the leg side and hits inside out to wide long-off
goes right back to tap to the leg side
short and Yuvaj goes back to punch to long-on
takes one step before pushing back to wrist a full delivery past square leg
loopy flighted delivery, driven to long-on for yet another single.
quicker, on the pads, tickled to right of short fine-leg for a single
quick one, on the off stump, Yuvraj stabs it off the outside edge to short third man
starts off with a long hop outside off stump, punched to right of long-off
short again and this time Gambhir disposes via a pull shot to the midwicket boundary. He is marching to his ton
another short one hit just wide of long-off
goes right back to push to long-off
Gorgeous inside out drive. And he is all smiles. Came down the track and hit a googly inside out with the turn to wide long-off
driven past the bowler and retains the strike. He is on 95.
leans across to tap a delivery past square leg
Yuvraj copies Gambhir and gets a single.
down the leg side, just a tickle and another run has been accumulated. 13 to win
slower in the air, Yuvraj waits and rotates the strike back to Gambhir, on 97, with a push to long-on
stays back to wrist a full delivery turning into him to square leg.
Dhoni signals to just block it - everyone wants Gauti to score a ton- not that Yuvraj would have seen the signal but he does just that. Gambhir smiles at Yuvi .
short of length, just outside off, punched to covers.
well outside the off stump, Gambhir jabs at it, bat hit the ground, the ball nestles into the 'keeper's gloves
length delivery on the stumps, pushed to the on side and they pick up a single after the direct hit ricochets off the stumps
overpitched outside off stump, sweetly timed covers and there is a fumble. Gambhir comes on strike. 99.

And that's his hundred and both batsmen celebrate in the middle as they set off for the run. It was a short-of-length delivery and punched through extra over. Gambhir pumps his fist, Yuvi raises his bat and in the back ground Raina whistles!
And almost on cue, Yuvraj gets bowled after the event. Full, straight and Yuvraj tried to whip it across the line, missed and loses his middle stump. Holding would have drawled, "If you miss, I hit"
fullish, outside off and Raina drives to covers
charges down the track and slams a length delivery on the up and through covers.
bouncer on the leg stump line and Gambhir ducks
another charge down the track and Mortaza fires it short and Gambhir can't connect with his pull
short of length delivery, Gambhir stays on the leg stump line and punches it to covers
a tad slower, gambhir waits before punching it through mid-off
on the leg and middle, full in length, Raina defends down the track.

He took the front leg out of the line and swung a length delivery across the line. Game over. It will be a India-Pakistan final.The Bangladesh fielders congratulate Gambhir who takes the helmet off and walks off to the pavilion.
